alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 18 at 8:23PM MST until August 18 at 10:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons and the Western Mogollon Rim, including Flagstaff and Sedona. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. Unpaved roads could become muddy and impassable. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
